ComicInfo.Summary:
After telling Magdalena of this newly learned fact that she is dying, Magdalena suggests that Dinah try and use her femininity over a man who hates her and she chooses her former teacher, Dr. Fischer. Its not long before she has managed to completely seduce the man and make him her slave, hoping that it will be her cure but she finds out afterward that the more sex she has, the more likely to die she is. Magdalena then reveals that it was her spirit that had spoken to Dinah, that she was the one who was supposed to embrace her femininity and that thankfully she has found a spell that should help Dinah. The two perform the spell, using a crack addict named Carl to bind to Dinah but as the spell goes on, things come to a climax when Dinah thinks its too late...
